tool_description: Generates professional price quotes with itemized pricing, terms, and payment options for portrait photography services.

client_id.description: Unique identifier of the client requesting the quote

package_id.description: Service package identifier from Service Package Builder

quote_valid_days.description: Number of days the quote remains valid (1 to 90)

discount_percentage.description: Promotional discount to apply (0 to 50 percent)

error_messages: Client not found: The specified client_id does not exist in the system.
Package not found: The specified package_id does not exist or is invalid.
Invalid quote validity: Quote valid days must be between 1 and 90.
Invalid discount: Discount percentage must be between 0 and 50.
Quote generation failed: Unable to create quote with provided parameters.
usage: Provide client_id and package_id to generate a professional quote. Optionally set quote_valid_days and discount_percentage for custom terms.

subtotal.description: Total price before tax and discounts

final_total.description: Final quoted price including all adjustments

expiration_date.description: When the quote expires in ISO 8601 format
